attributes.action: put pressure on Mark Thompson to abandon plans to Axe BBC Radio 6
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BBC Radio 6 provides a valuable alternative service to BBC Radio 1 and 2, promoting new music and playing a diverse range.  It should not be axed.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
